question.body: Which of the following contains a lacteal?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Plicae cirulares are ridges in the small intestine that allow for better absorption
Correct. Villi are projections in the lumen that have blood capillary and a lacteal in the center.
Incorrect. Mircovilli are extensions of the plasma membrane of a cell that increase surface area for absorption.
Incorrect. The brush border is the “fuzzy “appearance of the mucosal surface that results from the microvilli.
